min3d.core
Class RenderCaps

java.lang.Object
  min3d.core.RenderCaps

public class RenderCaps
extends java.lang.Object

Simple static class holding values representing various capabilities of hardware's concrete OpenGL capabilities that are relevant to min3d's supported features.
